text.0: one state begets another state husk is made visible from husk.
text.1: within his mothers side he speaks.
text.2: discerning have they offered gifts they guard the strength that never wastes.
text.3: to a strong fort have they pressed in.
text.4: Śvaitreyas people all his men have gloriously increased in might.
text.5: a gold chain bṛhaduktha wears as through this soma seeking spoil.
text.6: i bring as twere the longedfor milk the dear milk of the sisterpair.
text.7: like to a caldron filled with food is he unconquered conquering all.
text.8: beam of light come to us in sportive fashion finding thyself close to the wind that fans thee.
text.9: these flames of his are wasting flames like arrows keenpointed sharpened on his breast.
